entry.title: Sunday: Near blizzard. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Near blizzard developing late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Near blizzard. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Near blizzard ending near midnight then a few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
